channel.title: UISuite on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in UISuite on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Forms Backend
item.description: You make the forms, we made the backend Don't worry about your forms, we cover it all without any coding required Add Forms, its free <form action="form.uisuite.io/your-form-id" method="post" <input name="name" type="text" <input name="email" type="email" <input name="phone" type="number" </form How it work Create Just give a name to your form and get the form URL Embed Add the form URL in the action attribute in any of your forms

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Your privacy is critically important to us. UISuite.io is located at: UISuite.ioB-8 Sushant Lok 3, Phase C, Sector 57 Gurgaon 122003 - Sector 57 , India It is UISuite.io's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to https://uisuite.io (hereinafter, "us", "we", or "https://uisuite.io"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information you may provide us through the Website.

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: Welcome to UISuite.io! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of uisuite.io's Website, located at https://uisuite.io. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use uisuite.io if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "
